name: Exodus
description:
in Exodus, you'll embody the hand of God, leading the Hebrews out of Egypt. With the power to manipulate the environment, you will be able to help your people overcome enemies and obstacles in their path. The game offers a diverse range of challenging puzzles, each world has with a unique twist on the game's mechanics.

You can tear up the sea for Moses to pass, and restore it ro stop the enemy



Other puzzles, require using a combination of multiple interactions with the environment. For example, in one stage, player need to coordinate a moment of a snake wave with the tearing of the sea so that Moses can pass safely



Or in another stage, use a combination of blended color waves and triggered mirrors in order to open a color-coded gate



As the game progresses you are introduced to many varied mechanics and increasingly difficult puzzles built around them
